ai.summary: Drumee Cemetery offers a short, easy 2.4 km walk through well-kept grounds in the UK. The route is gentle and suitable for beginners, families, and those seeking a quiet, reflective outdoor stroll.
ai.terrain_summary: Predominantly level, well-maintained cemetery paths with some gravel sections. Mostly flat, with occasional minor uneven stones near memorials. Wheelchair and stroller accessible sections are common, though surfaces may vary.
ai.safety_notes: Respect all memorials and on-site rules. Stay on marked paths, watch for uneven surfaces, and mind loose cobbles near headstones. Check weather conditions and bring appropriate clothing. Keep to a safe pace, stay hydrated, and let someone know your plans. Leash dogs and clean up after them; carry a phone for emergencies.
ai.best_seasons: All year, with the most pleasant conditions in spring and autumn.
